text:
The Sathuvachari police station on Monday received a call threatening of bomb explosion in the house of a Congress party man in Rangapuram. The bomb detection and disposal squad rushed to the house and conducted checks. The call turned out to be hoax.

According to police, the police station received a call close to 12 noon. The caller told the police that a bomb has been planted in a house of Devendran, a Congress party man, in Rangapuram.

Police has picked up a man and is conducting inquiry.
title: Hoax bomb call
